title: Honest question about MMR
body:
Hello guys this is ofc not my main acc because i dont play here since 2013.

I Would like to ask one question for smarts ppl, if someone hit D5 with high mmr he won everything jump to D3 then he win all games on D3 and jump to D1 but, on D1 this guy lose like 17 games in a row and still D1 with 0 Lp, and now he starts to earn only 11 Lp for game, so rhis guy win 10 games to grab 100 Lp ok, but he lost 3 games in a row inside promos and hit 25 LP ( he lose 25 lp for game ) and now he lose one more and back to 0 LP, how many wins this guy need to fix he's MMR?

If someone in this community be able to help my friend will get very happy because he is almost uninstalling lol after long journey trying to hit MASTER.

replies.body: I can't provide you the exact answer on how to fix your MMR! As you already know, MMR decreases and increases with wins or losses. You, or your friend have already made it to Diamond so it's not an impossible feat to get that MMR back up there so you're winning more LP! Would also suggest checking out our [Ranked Faq](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760) for more information.
